data.eml:eml: A new species of Hisonotus (Siluriformes, Loricariidae) from rio Sao Francisco basin, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roxo, Fabio F., Silva, Gabriel S. C., Oliveira, Claudio (2015): A new species of Hisonotus (Siluriformes, Loricariidae) from rio Sao Francisco basin, Brazil. ZooKeys 498: 127-143, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.498.6896, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.498.6896
